content:
# The smelting process has timed out again, indicating that the furnace has not produced the expected iron plates. 
# This suggests that there may be an issue with the furnace's operation or the amount of coal available.
# 
# I will inspect the furnace's inventory once more to determine how many iron plates it has produced and check its fuel status.

# Checking the furnace inventory and status again.
furnace_inventory = inspect_inventory(furnace)  # Check the furnace's inventory.
furnace_status = get_entities({Prototype.StoneFurnace})  # Getting status of the furnace.

print(f"Furnace Inventory: {furnace_inventory}")  # Displaying the furnace's inventory.
print(f"Furnace Status: {furnace_status}")  # Displaying the status of the furnace.
